comment: 3 tests and a project. no connect homework or quizzes to boost grades, which is unusual for an intro class. Did not really explain concepts and let students answer other students questions. One time said Coca-Cola was a monopoly. Could not answer questions on the test and simply referred the student to the textbook. Nice lady, not structured though
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Graded by few things--Test heavy

comment: This professor is inexperienced. I feel like I didnt learn anything this semester. She is unorganized and the class seems like she just made it as she goes. Do not take class.

This class was quite simply a mess. Simple information such as test dates and project due dates are near impossible to find due to her inability to use D2L. Lectures are absolutely pointless because the tests come 100% from the textbook. On top of this, she can be rude and disrespectful for no reason. Avoid this professor at all costs.

Dr. Smith is caring and kind but I've never been in such a disorganized and confusing class in my life. What she was telling us changed every other day and made the class a nightmare. 2 tests w essays, and a final. A big group project with barely any directions, and class participation. While she's nice, I highly advise taking *ANYONE* else. Beware
rating_tags: Participation matters--Graded by few things--Group projects

comment: Oof. Where do I begin. Changes things so last minute and you can never reach her. Youll need to read the book or you wont know anything for the exams. Choose your group members wisely for the project. Get ready for a rollercoaster because thats what this class feels like
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Test heavy--Group projects

comment: She don't really know what she doing, tried to teach but was never specific enough for what we were graded on. I wouldn't take her for any class.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Graded by few things

comment: Here's the meat and potatoes. There is no point in emailing, she won't respond. The group project is easy but annoying. She is unbelievably confusing and isn't even remotely clear with grading. She will not listen to school policy and will change things very last minute. She takes attendance in the dumbest way possible. You should pick another prof

You have 2 tests and a final and the final is not cumulative. You have a group project you have to present and then you get a class participation grade. The tests are two days first day is answer 3 out of 4 essay questions next day is multiple. She doesnt really go over the material for the test, but if you read the chapters you should be okay.

The professor does try her best to make the class fun, however going to class is almost useless. You learn everything through the book because her lectures are not very useful. Her study guides are simply telling you to go read the book. The group project is poorly explained. I recommend not taking her.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Skip class? You won't pass.--Graded by few things

comment: The powerpoint lectures don't tell you squat. She gives you resources but the real info is in the book. If you wanna pass the tests, read every chapter. The group project would have been fine if she didn't change the format a few days before the due date. Fun classes, but you won't learn test material in class.
rating_tags: Accessible outside class--Get ready to read--Group projects

comment: This class was horrible when we were all in school. Became 10 times worse during the coronavirus and we moved to online. But shell say shes the best online teacher ever! Has no clue what she is doing. Its chaotic. If she is your last option, dont take her, wait another semester.

Professor Smith has a great sense of humor which makes the lectures enjoyable. The tests are made of content from the textbooks, so if you study and read, youll do well. The group project was a good experience. The class would be a great experience for marketing majors. Professor Smith is not a pushover, but is approachable and loves to help.

Honestly I don't even know where to start. This entire semester got flipped due to the corona virus and she made it 10x worse. I don't even have enough characters to describe the crap she just pulled on us with 3 weeks left but just know she is horrible.

One of the worst professors I have ever had. She spends the entire lecture gloating about herself. That she has her LLC, and she was an amazing online professor. Tests are from the textbook, and its hundreds of pages of information. Attendance is mandatory, but dont bother paying attention, it wont help. Takes 2+ weeks to grades exams
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Participation matters--Tough grader

comment: One of the worst professors I've ever had. All she does is ramble about how she has her own LLC and tells us how she was a student once and knows how we feel. NEVER GRADES ON-TIME. She does not teach the class at all. Class is USELESS, but you still have to show for attendance. All the tests are straight from the book. Easy class she makes it hard.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Group projects--So many papers
